title: Tale of one city
creator_credit: Zoran Janjic, Peter Johnson, Department of Housing, Environment and Community Development and Film Australia
brief_description: This film uses animation in a light-hearted manner to show some of the problems of living in a modern city, the need for more careful urban planning to help alleviate these problems, and the way in which pressure groups have an important influence on the town planners.
